website_summaries.verdict: Keds Champion Chambray is bundled up with a soft-toned fabric, nearly resembling muted denim. It’s teeming with comfort rewards coming from its breathable cover, lightweight body, and slightly cushioned footbed. In terms of sizing, this low-top sneaker tends to exceed one’s typical shoe length. However, it can be fixed by either sizing down by half or wearing thick socks. Even so, this Chambray bundle, a lovely offspring of the Keds Champion, embodies a positive vibe that leaves its wearers beaming in bliss inside and out.
pros: The Keds Champion Chambray provides an adequate arch support that keeps the feet from getting sored quickly, as declared by several users
Some narrow footed users who opted not to size down said that having a large width allowed them to enjoy wearing this shoe for long hours
The chambray fabric is thick enough to last a long time but not too stiff that it becomes
The Chambray gray colorway looks great with jeans
The colors match perfectly with almost any spring and summer wardrobe, according to many users
Expect to get compliments wearing this shoe as it makes the feet divine with its slim profile, as stressed by numerous users
A type of cut and style that never goes out of fashion, as declared by loyal Keds followers
The Champion Chambray is versatile enough that it is an ideal go-to choice for leisurely city traveling
A preferred shoe to slip on with any clothes for short errands, described by some buyers
Very lightweight and it isn’t bulky, affirmed by many
The price is reasonable that several buyers went purchasing additional pairs in different shades
The feet do not feel constricted with its closed toe structure
cons: This sneaker seems to be half size larger than one’s typical shoe length, noted by quite a lot of reviewers
In spite of its comfort advantages, one user stated that it isn’t the type of shoe for long days’ work or all-day walking
One reviewer realized too late that this sneaker needed a little break in time using thick socks which could have prevented her pinky toes from getting blistered

customer_reviews.title: Love the Keds! Perfect summer kick around shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes! Such cute Keds! Keds are not meant to be shoes with huge arch support. They are meant to be cute, versatile, and fun footwear. This pair really fits the bill! The color will match almost anything in your spring or summer wardrobe. The chambray is thick enough to last without being so thick it would be uncomfortable. They are the quality you expect from Keds. They definitely fit on the narrower side of normal rather than the wide side. I would not recommend these shoes if you normally wear a wide width shoe. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Mary F. Mcclure

customer_reviews.title: but it wasn't so bad. Super cute
customer_reviews.text: First off, I wear a size 8.5 in tennis shoes but for Keds and vans I go a half size down so you may want to try that. I loooove these shoes! It took a little while to break them in and I did get some blisters, but it wasn't so bad. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I may have gone a half-size smaller because the shoe fits a little loose on my foot. If you wear a thicker sock, it may work just fine; I do not particularly like wearing thick socks unless they're with combat boots.
customer_reviews.author: Success2010

customer_reviews.title: Love my Keds
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Keds for over 30 years, prices are ridiculous. My only wish is that when I wash them, they would come clean. I never had any trouble with cleaning until recent years, not sure the change, overall, I love my Keds and wear them frequently. Color is as described.
customer_reviews.author: MTEK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Summer Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have already worn these so much I may have to buy a second pair. The color goes great with so many things. I have medium width feet and they are perfect. Just enough arch support to keep you from getting sore feet after many hours. Great for summer running around with shorts, capris and skirts. Love these tennies!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Mom

customer_reviews.title: My first pair of Keds I really dislike.
customer_reviews.text: I love Keds, just not a fan of these ones. I have 3 other pairs and they are all the same size 6.5M. They all fit me fine. I wore these for less than half an hour and got blisters on both my pinky toes. I have not worn them since. They look great but do not feel great. They run narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Blessedfamily

customer_reviews.title: a 9 usually fits me comfortably snugly but these feel close to a half size ...
customer_reviews.text: Keds has very erratic sizing. These seem to run large for Keds; a 9 usually fits me comfortably snugly but these feel close to a half size too large. Nice color, and I got a compliment the first time I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these cute shoes!! I can slip these on with nearly every simple dress, shorts or jeans and head out of the door. I think they look nice, and are great when you need a closed toe shoe!
customer_reviews.author: MBHE

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They're my go-to when traveling and I get compliments on them all the time. I will admit though, I don't have any foot issues. So I'm not sure if they're just as good for people with problems or for people who need insoles. But they're DEFINITELY better on my feet than flats. I can wear them all day and my feet don't get sore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for $12 and love them. They dig into heels a bit without socks on but are very comfortable for walking around. I walked around NYC for a whole weekend in these and they held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Santana Perez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and of course they never go out of style
customer_reviews.text: For my 90 year old mother-in-law. She wore the same shoe in 1940. Excellent and of course they never go out of style.
customer_reviews.author: Military History Nut

customer_reviews.title: ... not much arch support in any Keds but I love them anyways
customer_reviews.text: There is not much arch support in any Keds but I love them anyways! I wear these to work in a lab and I can wear them all day comfortably. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sciencefanatic

customer_reviews.title: She says they are comfy and she is happy with the fit and style
customer_reviews.text: My teen daughter was thrilled with these shoes. She says they are comfy and she is happy with the fit and style.
customer_reviews.author: Bturner

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow but well made and I can wear them once they warm up.
customer_reviews.text: Seems these shoes were made for children. I can get them on but they are painful until they warm up from my feet. Then I can wear them comfortable all day.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Alice S. Franceschini

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Fit like I expected, but would be nice to have a little more support in the footbed.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Little

customer_reviews.title: light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love keds, they are easy to wear and comfortable. I recommend any type of ked they are a great shoe and machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: For the price they are great and I would purchase them again
customer_reviews.text: They are cute and comfy, but seem to need some breaking in which I feel shouldn't be that way with a sneaker. For the price they are great and I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan Behrens

customer_reviews.title: I would not but these again. They're all right ...
customer_reviews.text: I would not but these again. They're all right for around the yard and house, but never for work as I'm on my feet for seven hrs. and that would never work with these shoes. No arch support or cushion of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: My New Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I need a good slip free shoe for daily use. They are nice because the other exercise ones are too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: G. N. Thayer

customer_reviews.title: i love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: i love this shoe, it is comfy and the only downside is i wish the shoes were a bit wider.im noticing all the keds i like do not have wider fit hmm.
customer_reviews.author: aura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Keds. Wore them as a kid. Great for someone in Her seventies.
customer_reviews.author: Joan letchworth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All clothing articles and toys are for great grand children that live900 miles from me.
customer_reviews.author: Delores J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do like the way Ked Shoes fit my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow and I've never had to purchase wide shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Keds
customer_reviews.text: The chambray of the blue matches nicely with everything and the simple Keds style makes pairing these super easy. They are not shoes I would wear if i expect to be on my feet all day (at an amusement park) but definitely good to run errands in.
customer_reviews.author: popi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but don't ignore the fact that they do have a narrow fit
customer_reviews.author: Libbie Sudweeks

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love keds shoes, I've had them for around a year and they still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Luna85

customer_reviews.title: I've gotten keds before and am usually a 7. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten keds before and am usually a 7.5, but these are a bit big, I wish I would've went with a 7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not great comfort but I enjoy how they look
customer_reviews.text: They're keds, not great comfort but I enjoy how they look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes, but one size bigger than I usually wear
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Long and Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very cute style. Love the yellow tag in the side. Runs a bit long and narrow. I'm on the wider side of 8/8.5 so there's a little gapping around my ankles but I kept them anyway :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love these shoes!! so comfy, and they fit perfectly. i want more!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've loved Keds many years - quality and.fit are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Hill

customer_reviews.title: a very good choice
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, love the color. Just as I expected it.
customer_reviews.author: Oreanna Acosta

product_meta.title: Keds Womens Champion Canvas Hight Top Lace Up Fashion Sneakers
product_meta.description: Women's Keds, Champion Lace up Shoe What a Champion! This is THE original vulcanized sneaker that started it all! Classic, heritage styling and with a unique look that is all keds Breathable canvas upper Lace up closure for a secure fit Fabric lining Cushioned footbed with arch support Lightweight rubber outsole
feature_bullets: Low-profile sneaker with lace-up closure featuring textured wrap-around midsole and logo on tongue
